input.sentences: [male] and [female] were giving a power point presentation to the company .
they sat down before giving their presentation .
[male] gets up and starts going over his plan for the company .
he sets up his computer right to get the information correct on the screen .
here is them giving their presentation in full and the company is blown away by it .
output.sentences: We had a guest speaker session today.
Two people came in and taught us about laptops and computer stuff.
It was fun to see what they had to say.
They even made us show them what we learned!
I think I did ok, or so they said at the end of the lesson.
